title: Service Battery
message:
Very quick question, not seen this before, searched the net and after doing the SMC reset, same problem exists just need some advice before I make a report to the company that potentially is buying it in.
MBA A1370 mid 2011. Battery indicator and in system info show 40 cycle count and service battery. Opened the MBA up and it has a new battery fitted. So assuming the battery is not good, is there anything else I need to be checking.
TIA
Marc

title: Service Battery
message:
Try known good battery, even old one.
Never trust the crappy new chinese batteries.

title: Service Battery
message: New battery.... use an A1495 to replace
